Scream.help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while slowing their movement and weakening their resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Scream.targetHelp: You are being buffeted by waves of sound and taking damage! Your damage resistance and movement speed has been reduced.

Shout.help: You blast your foe with a tremendous Shout, damaging him and reducing his Damage Resistance. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Shout.targetHelp: The sonic Shout has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Howl.help: A short range, but powerful sonic attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Howl.targetHelp: The Howl has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Shockwave.help: You can call forth a tremendous Shockwave that can knock down foes and deal some Smashing and Energy damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Sonic_Dispersion.help: You create a large field of sonic waves, protecting all allies inside. The SonicDispersion gives all allies within increased Resistance against all damage except Psionic. The Sonic Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Dispersion.shortHelp: Toggle: PBAoE, Ally +Res(All Damage, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.targetHelp: The Sonic Bubble is granting you Resistance to all types of damage as well as Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting effects.
Sonic_Dispersion.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from most damage types with your {PowerName}.
Sonic_Dispersion.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

Revive.help: Should the Wailer King fall in battle, they can Revive themselves from the brink of death.

messages.attackerHit: You heal {PlayerDest} with {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage over time.

Sonic_Barrier.help: This shield dramatically reduces the damage an ally takes from Smashing, Lethal, and Toxic attacks for a limited time. Multiple shields from the same hero cannot be stacked; however, the Sonic Barrier can be improved when another hero uses the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Sonic Haven. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Sonic_Barrier.targetHelp: The Sonic Barrier has increased your resistances to Smashing, Lethal and Toxic damage.

Screech.help: By bursting forth with this hypersonic Screech, you can disorient a target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Screech.targetHelp: You have been Disoriented and your resistance to damage has been decreased.

Sirens_Song.help: You send forth a subsonic pulse which causes your foes to fall unconscious and take some damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Long
Sirens_Song.targetHelp: The Siren's Song has rendered you unconscious.

Shriek.targetHelp: The sonic Shriek has slowed your movement speed and weakened you. You are more vulnerable to damage.
